text: Hi guys - have a full-time perm ember engineer role available. Grad/junior/senior all welcome. Based in lovely Windsor complete with fresh air and regular tea with the Queen (might be overpromising here). We do agency stuff as well as develop our own internal IP. Have ember deployments with some fairly big clients, keen for another hand to come help us on this. Please DM me to find out more!
Also - particularly interested in juniors/grads we can train up - any recommendations/friends please let me know. :simple_smile:
if you’d like to make an announcement at this Thursday’s meetup you’re very welcome
Thanks <@U03V8V08M> :simple_smile: - might just, but depends on workload here. If only we had another pair of hands…. :wink:
<@U040DRY7U>: also if you’d like me to announce on your behalf, send slide contents to <mailto:info@emberlondon.com|info@emberlondon.com>
